title: Update regarding FinCorp
story_body:
FinCorp (FIN) Issues Update on Various Corporate Matters

At 08:00 EST, FinCorp (FIN), a leading financial services provider, released a routine update on several corporate matters.

Personnel Update:
FinCorp announced the appointment of Ms. Jane Doe as Vice President, Human Resources, effective immediately. Ms. Doe joins FinCorp from a similar role at a major financial institution.

Marketing Initiative:
FinCorp launched a targeted marketing campaign aimed at promoting its online banking services to existing customers. The campaign, which began on February 15, 2023, at 09:00 EST, will run for a period of six weeks.

ESG Disclosure:
FinCorp published its annual Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) report, which provides an overview of the company's sustainability initiatives and performance metrics for the calendar year 2022. The report is available on FinCorp's website, www.fincorp.com, under the "Investor Relations" section.

In other news, FinCorp confirmed that its quarterly dividend payment of $0.25 per share will be paid on March 15, 2023, to shareholders of record as of February 28, 2023.

No further information is available at this time.
